Module ChessTournament
Package ntnu.idatt2001.k2g9.gui.controllers

Class AdminManageController

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt2001.k2g9.gui.controllers.AdminManageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AdminManageController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller that administers the fxml file "admin-manage-tournaments" and handles all the events on said fxml file

    • editTournament

      public void editTournament(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      method that gets the tournament ID from the user selected tournament in the GUI. it then sets the ID in the controller that will be handling the edit functionality, and then calls the fxml loader method in this class to load the edit fxml file
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException
